org.aaronhe.rxgooglemapsbinding

Class RxGoogleMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aaronhe.rxgooglemapsbinding.RxGoogleMaps

  • public final class RxGoogleMaps
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods for creating observables for GoogleMap.

      • mapReady

        public static  mapReady(MapView mapView)
        Create an observable which emits when GoogleMap is ready to use.

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to mapView. Unsubscribe to free this reference.

      • myLocationChanges

        @Deprecated
public static  myLocationChanges(GoogleMap map)
        Deprecated. 
        Create an observable which emits when My Location changes on a map.

        Warning: This is deprecated. Use use com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderApi instead. See GoogleMap.OnMyLocationChangeListener

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to map. Unsubscribe to free this reference.

      • snapShotReady

        public static  snapShotReady(GoogleMap map,
                  android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Create an observable which emits on map snapshot taken events. This method is equivalent to snapShotReady(GoogleMap) but lets you provide a preallocated bitmap. See GoogleMap#snapshot(GoogleMap, Bitmap).

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to map and bitmap. Unsubscribe to free this reference.

      • locationSourceLocationChanges

        public static  locationSourceLocationChanges(LocationSource source)
        Create an observable which emits on source location change events.

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to source. Unsubscribe to free this reference.
